name: Field Hospital: Valkyrie
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Explicit Language

Save lives and keep morale high as you manage an understaffed and overrun field hospital. Assign medical staff to patients to increase their chances of survival. But be careful! If patients die the morale of your staff will lower, making them less effective. Manage their morale by giving them breaks from the constant flow of casualties. Can you keep soldiers alive while war wages right outside your hospital?

Programming: Justin "Warspiteful" Almendral, Brandon Lyman, Kane 许鸿康 Xu

Music & Sound Design by: Eric Franklin, Achilles Jiang

Written & Designed by: Natalie “Witch Hat Natalie” Bickelhaupt

Art: Peter "MrPeterss" Bidoshi
